oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Riding horseback in the mountains. Old number 16204 B1
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thompson Brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two people crossing a stream on horseback in the Smoky Mountains. Two men standing on footbridge? over the stream. Opens-sided structure in the distance.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Great Smoky Mountains; Horseback riding; Rivers; Pedestrian bridges;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Great Smoky Mountains Photographs - Thompson Brothers
